    • Method Detail

      • writeUnsignedByte

        protected final void writeUnsignedByte(int length,
                     int value)
                                throws IOException
        Writes an unsigned byte value. This method doesn't check the validity of the value and writes the lower length bits in value.
        Parameters:
        length - bit length between 0 (exclusive) and 8 (inclusive).
        value - value
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs.

      • writeUnsignedShort

        protected final void writeUnsignedShort(int length,
                      int value)
                                 throws IOException
        Writes an unsigned short value. This method doesn't check the validity of the value and writes the lower length bits in value.
        Parameters:
        length - bit length between 0 (exclusive) and 16 (inclusive)
        value - value to write
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs

      • writeBoolean

        public final void writeBoolean(boolean value)
                        throws IOException
        Writes a boolean value. Only one bit is used; 1 for true 0 for false.
        Parameters:
        value - value
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs

      • writeUnsignedInt

        public final void writeUnsignedInt(int length,
                    int value)
                            throws IOException
        Writes an unsigned int value. An IllegalArgumentException will be thrown if length or value is out of valid range.
        Parameters:
        length - bit length between 1 (inclusive) and 32 (exclusive)
        value - unsigned int value
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs.

        value - signed int value

      • writeLong

        public final void writeLong(int length,
             long value)
                     throws IOException
        Writes a signed long value in length bits.
        Parameters:
        length - bit length between 1 (exclusive) and 64 (inclusive).
        value - value to write
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs.

        public final void writeBytes(byte[] bytes,
              int offset,
              int length)
                      throws IOException
        Writes length bytes in bytes from offset.
        Parameters:
        bytes - bytes
        offset - the start offset in bytes
        length - number of bytes to write
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs.

      • writeASCII

        public final void writeASCII(String value)
                      throws IOException
        Writes a 7-bit ASCII string. Writes a 31-bit unsigned integer for the character count following all characters which each is written as 7-bit unsigned byte.
        Parameters:
        value - ASCII string to write
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs

      • writeUTF

        public final void writeUTF(String value)
                    throws IOException
        Writes a UTF string. Identical to DataOutput.writeUTF(String).
        Parameters:
        value - string to write
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs
        See Also:
        DataOutput.writeUTF(String)

      • aling

        public final void aling(int length)
                 throws IOException
        Aligns to given length as bytes.
        Parameters:
        length - the number of bytes to align
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs.
